S:log-item.D:comment:
LUCENE-837: Added optional bytes field to store on the Document. Enabled ReutersDocMaker w/ the ability to store byte data in a field. If the param is set (see the javadocs) it will store the contents of the body as a UTF-8 byte array.
Then, the SearchTravRetLoadFieldSelectorTask (whew) can take in parameters specifying what fields to load (others are ignored by default)
